pullRequest.body:
Define `AffineSubspace.orthogonal` and `AffineSubspace.IsOrtho`, as well as develop an API emulating that of `Submodule.orthogonal` and `Submodule.IsOrtho`, respectively. Additionally, provide some relevant lemmas exclusive to affine subspaces, which are mostly to do with the relationship between orthogonality and `AffineSubspace.Parallel`.

Closes #5539

---

Still WIP as I need to add more docstrings as well as notations for the new definitions.

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go

will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:

nodes.body: @MithicSpirit: I note this is still marked draft; did you forget to mark this ready for review?

@eric-wieser Sorry for the long delay. I left this marked as draft because I intended to write docs for a few more things and maybe touch up some proofs. However, I've been quite busy for the past few months (school started back up), so I haven't had time to work on this (and, to be honest, I kind of forgot about it).

I should have more time to work on this around the new year, but if you think that those improvements are unnecessary, I can mark this as ready for review now.

~~No idea why `lean4checker` failed, but looking at the logs (`could not execute external process 'lean4checker/build/bin/lean4checker'`) I suspect that it's not an issue with my code in specific.~~

Other than that, I think that it would be helpful if someone could come up with better notation than `ᗮᗮ` and `⟂⟂`. I would also appreciate feedback on any lemmas I should add; I tried to add all lemmas I could convert from `Submodule.orthogonal` and `.IsOrtho`, but there may be others that are useful.
Merging master will probably fix the CI issue

pullRequest.title: feat: implement orthogonality for AffineSubspace

nodes.body: @MithicSpirit: I note this is still marked draft; did you forget to mark this ready for review?

@eric-wieser Sorry for the long delay. I left this marked as draft because I intended to write docs for a few more things and maybe touch up some proofs. However, I've been quite busy for the past few months (school started back up), so I haven't had time to work on this (and, to be honest, I kind of forgot about it).

I should have more time to work on this around the new year, but if you think that those improvements are unnecessary, I can mark this as ready for review now.

~~No idea why `lean4checker` failed, but looking at the logs (`could not execute external process 'lean4checker/build/bin/lean4checker'`) I suspect that it's not an issue with my code in specific.~~

Other than that, I think that it would be helpful if someone could come up with better notation than `ᗮᗮ` and `⟂⟂`. I would also appreciate feedback on any lemmas I should add; I tried to add all lemmas I could convert from `Submodule.orthogonal` and `.IsOrtho`, but there may be others that are useful.
Merging master will probably fix the CI issue
